thread.title: David Brooks
thread.title_full: Drone World reviewed by David Brooks

author: David Brooks
title: David Brooks
text: I searched the Internet for the best price. I could have got the drone a little cheaper elsewhere, but that would have been just the drone. Drone world put together this awesome package and I saved over 800 dollars as I was planning on buying the other items as well. I do not know what your situation is but 800 is a good sum to me. With the 800 I saved I was able to buy 4 extra batteries. No worries about flight time now. I had one battery that was DOA, I called and they shipped one out that day and I got it the next day along with a return shipping label. Some of the best customer service that I have every received. Lifetime customer!
